Tag: Susannah Harker

Sapphire and Steel – Reassigned

In 2021 I wrote about the television series created by PJ Hammond Sapphire and Steel, beginning with a television series starring Joanna Lumley and David McCallum their appearances in comic book form and then the Big Finish Audio company version of the series starring David Warner and Susanna Harker. At that time, both David McCallum…
